sec.p: L.A.J. and P.D.M. conceived and designed the project; L.A.J. performed the analyses and interpretation of data; P.J.V. provided the Last Interglacial climate data; S.-J.K. (Getech Group Plc) provided the global digital elevation model; L.A.J., P.D.M., A.F. and P.A.A. contributed to the writing of the manuscript; L.A.J. produced the figures.
